summary: After an overseas deployment, two former French Foreign Legion members plan to break into the vault of a French corporation.
cast: Alain Delon|Charles Bronson|Olga Georges-Picot|Bernard Fresson|Brigitte Fossey|Ellen Bahl|Jean-Claude Ballard|Michel Barcet|Stéphane Bouy|André Dumas|Steve Eckardt|Marie-Noëlle Gresset|Lisette Lebon|Marianna Falk|Sandrine Schmidt|Catherine Sola|Antoine Baud|Béatrice Costantini|Guy Delorme|Raoul Guylad|Sylvain Levignac|Jacques Marbeuf|Claude Salez|Gilbert Servien|Jean-Paul Tribout
title: Adiós, amigo
